name: Arena Of Pain
description:
Survive the Arena against an endless onslaught of skeletons and ghosts. With your trusty staff in hand, can you live long enough? 

Controls: WASD to move, Space to jump, mouse to look around and click to shoot.

I made this project in a two days to teach myself how to build an expandable first person style character controller.

Playing in the browser can be wonky, download the game for the true experience!
